mapper.select: SELECT T1.ROLE_SEQ /*권한그룹일련번호*/ , T1.ROLE_NM /*권한그룹명*/ , T1.ROLE_ORDER /*권한그룹표시순서*/ , T1.RMRK /*권한그룹비고*/ FROM TB_ROLE T1 /*테이블_권한그룹*/ ORDER BY ROLE_ORDER ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER /*테이블_사용자*/ SET USER_NAME = #{userNameModal} /*사용자이름*/ , USER_STATUS_CODE = #{userStatusCode} /*사용자상태코드*/ , RMRK = #{rmrkModal} /*사용자비고*/ , LT_UPD_ID = #{loginInfo.userId} /*최종수정자ID*/ , LT_UPD_DTTI = NOW() /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} /*사용자아이디*/
UPDATE TB_USER_ROLE_MAP /*테이블_사용자_권한그룹_매핑*/ SET ROLE_SEQ = #{roleSeq} /*권한그룹일련번호*/ , LT_UPD_ID = #{loginInfo.userId} /*최종수정자ID*/ , LT_UPD_DTTI = NOW() /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} /*사용자아이디*/
